item.title: 莫迪表示，印度的目标是到 2030 年电子产业规模达到 5000 亿美元
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）大肆宣扬印度在技术领域的潜力，称印度的目标是到本十年末将电子产业的规模提高到 5000 亿美元。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi trumpeted India’s potential in technology, saying the country aims to increase its electronics sector to $500 billion by the end of the decade.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德的 Data4 公司将为雅典新址投资 3 亿欧元
item.description: 在人工智能服务推动数据中心需求不断增长的背景下，由布鲁克菲尔德（Brookfield）支持的 Data4 公司将投资约 3 亿欧元（约合 3.31 亿美元）在希腊建设和开发一个新的数据中心。【原文：Brookfield-backed Data4 will invest around €300 million ($331 million) to build and develop a new hub in Greece amid increasing demand for data centers driven by artificial intelligence services.】

item.title: 如果石油市场困境持续，托克集团将改装更多超级油轮
item.description: 如果市场持续低迷，Trafigura 集团可能会将更多的原油油轮转为运输成品油。【原文：Trafigura Group could switch more of its crude-oil tankers to carry refined products if sluggish market conditions persist.】

item.title: 能多洁股价暴跌，佩尔茨因北美地区警告受挫
item.description: Rentokil Initial Plc 的股价在伦敦交易市场暴跌，市值损失超过 20 亿英镑（26 亿美元），原因是这家害虫防治公司下调了北美业务的增长预期。【原文：Rentokil Initial Plc shares plunged in London trading, erasing more than 2 billion pounds ($2.6 billion) in market value, after the pest-control company lowered growth expectations for its business in North America.】

item.title: 美国两年期收益率在 CPI 报告公布前跌至 2022 年以来最低点
item.description: 美国国债反弹，使两年期国债收益率升至 2022 年以来的最低水平，而在此之前，人们密切关注的通胀数据可能会巩固对货币宽松政策的押注。【原文：US Treasuries rallied, driving the two-year yield to the lowest level since 2022 ahead of a closely watched inflation reading that could cement bets on monetary easing.】

item.title: 尼日利亚在国内美元债券拍卖中筹集 9 亿美元
item.description: 尼日利亚政府在其首次国内美元债券拍卖中筹集了 9 亿美元，几乎是目标金额的两倍。【原文：Nigeria’s government raised $900 million in its first domestic auction of dollar-denominated bonds, almost double the targeted amount.】

item.title: 与歌星周杰伦有关的港股突然暴跌 73
item.description: 周三，一家由亚洲流行巨星周杰伦之母支持的公司股价暴跌了 73%，创下历史新高，而且没有任何明显的原因。【原文：A company backed by the mother of Asia pop megastar Jay Chou saw its stock tumble by a record 73% Wednesday, with no immediately apparent reason.】

item.title: 欧洲股市在美国通胀和欧洲央行会议前走高
item.description: 欧洲股市走高，因为投资者在等待周三晚些时候将公布的敏感的美国通胀数据，以寻找有关美联储近期政策动向的线索。【原文：European stocks ticked higher as investors awaited sensitive US inflation data due later on Wednesday for clues about the Federal Reserve’s near-term policy moves.】

item.title: 贝莱德与意大利 Sace 公司就管理 30 亿欧元进行谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝莱德公司正在与意大利国家贸易信贷保险公司洽谈管理多达 30 亿欧元（33 亿美元）资产的事宜，此举可能会加强这家美国资产管理公司在欧元区第三大经济体的地位。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is in talks with Italy’s state trade credit insurer to manage up to €3 billion ($3.3 billion) of assets, a move that could bolster the US asset manager’s position in the euro zone’s third-largest economy, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 香港修订 "市场声音 "规则，加重银行负担
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港证券监察机构计划在年底前发布市场声音指引，并根据市场参与者的反馈意见对之前的草案进行修订，减少规范性规则。【原文：Hong Kong’s securities watchdog plans to publish market sounding guidelines by year-end, revising its previous draft by cutting back on prescriptive rules following feedback from market participants, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气价格波动，市场静待弗朗辛影响
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格在小幅涨跌之间摇摆不定，市场正在等待飓风弗朗辛的影响，预计飓风将于周三登陆路易斯安那州。【原文：European natural gas prices swung between small gains and losses as the market awaits the impact of Hurricane Francine, which is expected to make landfall in Louisiana Wednesday.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克的疱疹治疗药物在早期试验中失败，对制药商造成打击
item.description: 葛兰素史克公司（GSK Plc）的疱疹试验性疫苗在早期试验中失败了，这使该公司将第一种治疗疱疹的疫苗推向市场的努力中断了。【原文：GSK Plc’s experimental vaccine for herpes failed in an early-stage trial, halting an effort to bring the first shot for the condition to market.】

item.title: 阿联酋 2024 年最大首次公开募股后，NMDC 能源公司股价攀升
item.description: NMDC 集团的能源部门主要为能源行业提供建筑和疏浚服务，在阿联酋今年最大的首次公开募股中募集到 32.2 亿迪拉姆（8.77 亿美元）资金后，该部门在阿布扎比的首次交易中大幅上涨。【原文：The energy unit of NMDC Group, a provider of construction and dredging services mainly to the energy industry, jumped in its Abu Dhabi trading debut after raising 3.22 billion dirhams ($877 million) in the United Arab Emirates’ biggest initial public offering this year.】

item.title: 棕榈油因生物燃料需求前景和产量担忧而波动
item.description: 棕榈油产量前景不佳，加上近期石油价格下跌，人们对热带油的生物燃料吸引力感到担忧，因此棕榈油价格出现波动。【原文：Palm oil fluctuated on its poor production outlook and concerns about the tropical oil’s biofuel appeal following recent declines in petroleum prices.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团融资 4 亿美元，开始削减 Amplats 股份
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）称，该公司出售了1,394万股英美铂金有限公司（Anglo American Platinum Ltd.）股票，此举旨在增加该南非公司的自由流通量，以迎接全面退出。【原文：Anglo American Plc said it sold 13.94 million shares in Anglo American Platinum Ltd. in a move aimed at increasing the South African firm’s free float ahead of a full exit.】

item.title: 法郎大幅反弹引发瑞士大幅降息的呼声
item.description: 瑞士法郎涨至近十年来最强劲的水平，使主要央行今年首次大幅降息的前景更加明朗。【原文：The Swiss franc’s rally to the strongest level in almost a decade has raised the prospect of the first large interest rate cut by a major central bank this year.】

item.title: 北约上将称投票后美国不可能停止支持乌克兰
item.description: 北约高级军官说，无论总统选举结果如何，美国都不可能停止支持乌克兰对抗俄罗斯，因为前总统唐纳德-特朗普在与副总统卡马拉-哈里斯的首场辩论中表示，他希望战争结束。【原文：The US is unlikely to stop supporting Ukraine against Russia irrespective of the outcome of the presidential election, NATO’s senior military officer said, as former President Donald Trump told the first debate with Vice President Kamala Harris that he wants the war to be over.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将因 GDP 数据而下挫
乌克兰希望印度在结束俄罗斯战争中发挥更积极的作用
item.description: 乌克兰驻新德里大使说，如果印度想赢得联合国安理会常任理事国席位，就应在结束俄罗斯在乌克兰的战争中发挥更积极的作用。【原文：India should play a more active role in ending Russia’s war in Ukraine if it wants to win a permanent seat on the United Nations Security Council, Ukraine’s ambassador in New Delhi said.】

item.title: 降息不会迅速缓解消费者压力
item.description:
消费者在走，美国经济也在走，压力显而易见。另外：预测市场认为哈里斯在辩论中获胜。【原文：

As consumers go, so goes the US economy — and the pressure is evident. Plus: Prediction markets give the debate win to Harris.

】

item.title: 石油交易商蒙特福特从竞争对手 BGN 聘请 Yannick Luce 担任首席财务官
item.description: 石油贸易商蒙特福特集团（Montfort Group）聘请亚尼克-卢斯（Yannick Luce）担任首席财务官，该公司正寻求整合其在非洲和中东的仓储和炼油资产等业务。【原文：Oil trader Montfort Group has hired Yannick Luce as chief financial officer, just as the firm seeks to consolidate operations that include storage and refinery assets in Africa and the Middle East.】

item.title: 肯尼亚航空工人就拟议的阿达尼交易开始罢工
item.description: 肯尼亚航空业工人开始罢工，抗议阿达尼机场控股有限公司接管肯尼亚最大机场的运营计划，该计划将持续 30 年。【原文：Kenyan aviation workers began a strike to protest plans for Adani Airport Holdings Ltd. to take over operations of the nation’s biggest airport for 30 years.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

 

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

 

】

item.title: SBF 前女友埃里森要求免于因 FTX 入狱
item.description: 山姆-班克曼-弗里德的前女友要求不因参与 FTX 倒闭而被送进监狱。【原文：Sam Bankman-Fried’s former girlfriend is asking to not be sent to prison for her involvement in the collapse of FTX.】

item.title: 铁矿石跌至每吨 90 美元使矿山面临风险，铁矿石测试下限
item.description: 随着高成本矿山被挤出市场，铁矿石价格将在每吨 90 美元或更高的价位找到坚实的支撑。【原文：Iron ore’s plunge is about to test the view that the steelmaking material can find solid price support at $90 a ton or more as high-cost mines are nudged out of the market.】

item.title: 印尼 GoJek 试行普拉博沃免费午餐计划
item.description: GoTo 集团正在为学童分发免费午餐进行试运行，这是印尼当选总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）的一项基石计划，将于明年推出。【原文：GoTo Group is conducting trial runs for the distribution of free lunches to school children, a cornerstone program of Indonesian President-elect Prabowo Subianto that’s set to be rolled out next year.】

item.title: 本田在华裁员，三家工厂停产
item.description: 本田汽车公司（Honda Motor Co., Ltd.）正在裁员，并暂停其在中国三家工厂的生产，因为该公司正努力减少库存，并致力于在全球最大的汽车市场上进行更广泛的战略转型。【原文：Honda Motor Co. is slashing jobs and has paused production at three of its plants in China, as it seeks to trim inventories and work on a broader shift in strategy in the world’s largest car market.】

item.title: 中国的债券干预措施降低了短端利率，促进了交易
item.description: 从非基准 "特殊 "证券交易激增到短期债券收益率下滑，中国对本国政府债券市场的干预正在导致整个曲线出现异常。【原文：China’s intervention in the nation’s government bond market is leading to abnormalities across the curve, from a surge in trading of non-benchmark “special” securities to a slump in yields on short-maturity debt.】

item.title: 石油跌入 60 美元为全球经济软着陆拓宽了跑道
item.description: 如果对石油的一些最悲观的预测属实，那么世界发达经济体就有了一个新的理由，希望在明年获得更稳固的增长。【原文：The world’s advanced economies might just have a new reason to hope for a firmer growth footing in the next year, if some of the most bearish forecasts for oil hit the mark.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行从德国政府手中购得德国商业银行 4.5% 的股份
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）收购了德国政府出售的德国商业银行股份公司（Commerzbank AG）4.49% 的股份，使这家意大利贷款机构成为主要投资者。【原文：UniCredit SpA has bought the 4.49% stake that the German government has sold in Commerzbank AG, making the Italian lender a major investor.】
